snippet: Google's Nexus Q, a black ball meant to stream video and music, is the company's first try at building its own hardware. But as Claire Cain Miller reports on Thursday in The New York Times, Google's indefinite postponement of Nexus Q shipments last...
abstract: Google's Nexus Q, a black ball meant to stream video and music, is the company's first try at building its own hardware. But as Claire Cain Miller reports on Thursday in The New York Times, Google's indefinite postponement of Nexus Q shipments last week indicates the challenges it faces as it tries to move into hardware and social technology.

headline.main: Daily Report: A Stumble for Google With Media Player
